          <title>
            <string language="hu">Sedan, 1870</string>
            <string language="en">Sedan, 1870</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sedan, 1870</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Berline, 1870</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sedan, 1870</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sedan, 1870</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φορείο, 1870</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sedán, 1870</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">I. Vilmos átveszi III. Napóleon lemondó levelét Sedannál</string>
            <string language="en">William I. receives the abdication letter of Napoleon III. at Sedan</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">porosz-francia háború,  német egység,  </string>
            <string language="en">Prussian-French war, German unity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">William I. erhält den Verzichtbrief von Napoleon
III. bei Sedan</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">William I. reçoit la lettre d'abdication de 
Napoleon III. à la Berline</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">William I. recebe a letra da abdicação de 
Napoleon III. em Sedan</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">William I. riceve la lettera di abdicazione di 
Napoleon III. a Sedan</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ωηλληαμ I. λαμβάνει την επιστολή παραίτησης 
Napoleon ΙΙΙ. στο φορείο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guillermo I. recibe la letra de la abdicación de 
Napoleon III. en el Sedán</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Preussisch-Französischer Krieg, deutsche Einheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guerre Prussien-Française, unité allemande</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
